12.content:
Tara is a pretty average 13 year old, long brunette hair, a little short for her age but nothing crazy could probably pass as a 10 year old, being completely flat chested doesn't help her trying to stay in friend groups now since all of her friends are maturing much quicker than her. To make up for the lack of friends Tara turns to youtube, almost every day with out fail she puts up at least one new video and it could be anything, a toy review, a vlog about her day or week, a silly little skit, or whatever. Lately Tara's been wanting more followers and has noticed a huge rise in "challenges". After watching dozens of challenges she decided to make a video where she did a short challenge followed by a request to have the land of YouTube give her then next challenge.

The video opens. "Hey guys! It's me Tara back again and this time with a new kind of video I'll be doing the try not to laugh challenge! But wait after the video I'll have a contest for you all loyal followers and new alike!" The 'funny' video played as Tara watched and was shown in a mini screen. Once done Tara wiped the tears from her eyes. "Alright guys now it's your turn! You can decide what challenge I do next! All you have to do is comment what challenge you wanna see me do and who ever gets the most likes on their challenge idea wins and I'll do that challenge, now if it's something that involves a product send me the product! Thank you all so much! Bbbyyyeeeeeeeeee!" Tara logs off and heads to bed. Then next morning before school she notice there's two challenges gaining traction 'talk like a pirate for a day' and 'the diaper challenge'. The ladder of which she hadn't heard of before.

When Tara gets home from a fun day of school she rushes right on to you tube to see what challenge won. Tara scratches her head. "What is the diaper challenge?" Just then the door bell rings, she rushes to the door to see a package addressed to her. Quickly bring it into her room Tara opens it up to see a package of just what she needed for the challenge, a big pack of colorful diapers. They read 'Magical diapers for all sorts of fun for all sorts of ages'. "This is just weird." Tara says before...

1232.content:
The first pair she decides to try on is the yellow pair. Tara loves the color yellow. It always made her thing of sunshine and happiness. Add to that the fact that these diapers had smiley faces all over them.

Tara expected to feel weird about wearing diapers. She wasn't a baby afterall. But the minute she put the diapers on, a smile blossomed on her face.

"Tara! Come down for dinner," her mom called from downstairs. "And I mean now not after you finish your video!"

Normally this would be the moment when Tara rolled her eyes. But today she couldn't bring herself to do so. She cheerfully replied "Yes ma'am," to her mom and literally skipped down the stairs.

"Will wonders never cease," her mom exclaimed while feigning disbelieve. "You actually came down when I asked. This is a first."

Tara was still smiling while her mom, dad, and younger brother gathered around the table. In fact she never stopped smiling. Even while she was eating the smile never left her face.

"So Tara," her mom said while placing some more vegetables on Jimmy, the younger brother's plate. "Mrs. Watson called me today."

Tara's stomach dropped. She hadn't forgot about the incident today. Although really she didn't really understand what the big deal was anyways.

"She mentioned that you were really distracted today during class. And by distracted I mean you were to busy on your chromebook instead of completing the assignment."

" I wasn't playing. I was checking out my competitors to see who I was stacking up. Or if there was a way for me to get a competitive edge." The smile was still there.

"Young lady! I know you are not talking back to me. And wipe that grin off your face! This is not funny. When you are in class you should be doing your work! I do not want to hear you are goofing off in class again!"

Tara wasn't smiling at least not consciously. In fact she quite literally could not stop smiling. What in the world is going on?

12423.content:
Tara heads down stairs thinking her mom stopped by on her lunch break or maybe her aunt came by to take her out for ice cream, but apon entering the kitchen the tiny teen sees a tall woman and an average height but slightly over weight man digging through draws obviously searching for something.
Tara is scared and gasps as the woman looks up.
"I thought you said noone would be home Dave! Look now we gotta take care of this little rugrat!" The woman yells through her mask.
"Damn! My bad Dee! I'll get her!" Dave says grabbing his gun.
Tara sees the gun and freaks, she screams and runs back up to her room with Dave in hot pursuit.
Once in her room Tara shuts her door and hides in her closet behind clothes and toys. She holds her breaths short as the two intruders upstairs into her room.
Dave starts looking under the bed while Dee looks around at things, while Tara watches them carefully trying not to panic until Dave spots her. He rushes at her and grabs her out from the closet, the tiny 13 year old cant do much more than burst into tears crying out for her mommy and soaking her self causing a puddle to form on the floor.
Dave holsters his gun at Dee's command. The tall woman slowly picks up the crying Tara holding her against her chest.
"Ok Dave change of plans. Bring that box over here, then clean up that kitchen and go into the mothers room grab the jewelry then get right back here! Got me!" Dee says firmly but calm trying to calm down Tara.
"Ugh! Fine! You handle that baby!" Dave said running back out of the room.

Tara kept her eyes shut tight sobbing and mumbling about wanting her mommy, all while fearing the worst. Dee shook the crying girl a little while holding her to get her attention. Tara opened her eyes to see Dee holding her and noticed she peed her pants in fright.
Dee spoke. "Ok little girl you'll be kept safe and treated like gold, but only if you listen to me! Got it?!"

Tara shivered a little, gulped, and nodded. Dee nodded back as she laid Tara down on her bed.
"Wha...what are you going to do to me?" Tara whimpered feeling her cold damp shorts and undies pressed against her bottom.
"Well I'm getting you ready for a little trip with us. Now lay down and let me get you ready." Dee says grabbing the wipes, powder and a diaper from Tara's box she got for the challenge.
"Wwwwait... those aren't mine!" Tara sits up!
Dee glares at her from behind her mask.
"Now listen here little girl I have no time for this! I found your diapers and you obviously need them or your mommy to help you potty. I don't care why a 9 year old is such a big baby but you will listen to me or else!" Dee says harshly as Tara sobs more laying back down as Dee makes quick work of changing Tara out of her outfit and into a fluffy pink diaper with unicorns and pacifiers on it. Dee runs over and grabs a light pink shirt with a star on the chest and a tan shorts from Tara's dresser, quickly dressing the crying child before picking her back up as Dave runs back in the room.
"Ok jewelry, and money are loaded in the van! I see you got the little brat squared away. Now let's go!" Dave said in a rush.
Dee slaps him across the face.
"Don't yell at me again! Now grab that box on the floor and get us out of this place!" Dee says pointing at box of diapers and supplies on the floor as she carried Tara out of the house quickly and into the back of the van. Soon Dave was in the vans drivers seat with the diaper box set in the passenger's seat as he took off. Tara whimpers in Dee's lap as she watches her home fade away in the distance.

“Penny.” Chloe said, with her strictest voice “Aren’t you supposed to do your homework?”
Penny looked back at her sister, saying arrogantly “Don’t bother me, dumbass!”
“I’m your older sister! You can’t talk back to me like that!” Chloe exclaimed, blushing with anger.
“You’re only 5 years older than me.” Penny replied, defiantly, while turning her head back to the videogame “When I was born you weren’t out of diapers yet. So don’t try to act like you’re a grown up.”
Instead of getting angry like usual, Chloe smiled. Revenge would have been soon served on a silver platter.
“Ok, sweetheart. Why don’t you go wash yourself while I prepare dinner?” Chloe said, in a sickening sweet voice.
Penny looked at her older sister with wide open eyes.
“What are you plotting?” she said, don’t believing in her ears.

With these words, she reached for the bathroom. Sighing, Chloe went to the kitchen, thinking “So this is what you want, uh? Very well. Tomorrow morning you’ll have a sweet surprise. A sweet, soft, comfy and very bulky surprise.”
She giggled to herself, while preparing dinner.

As she gave the order, the still asleep Penny took her thumb to her mouth and began to suck it.
Grinning, Chloe then added “During the night, you will release in your diaper, and you’ll wake up tomorrow morning completely wet. You will be so ashamed that you’ll come straight to me and ask me to give you a punishment.”
She gave her little sister a kiss on the forehead, then leaved her room and went downstairs.
Chloe abandoned herself over the couch, with the biggest smile of her life.
“This will be glorious!” she exclaimed “I’ll reshape that brat into a sweet little girl!”
Still smiling, she decided to watch tv a bit before going to bed herself. As she turned it on, however, something strange happened.
It wasn’t the news itself, no. The news was about the rising prices of the grocery stores, nothing interesting. But what caught the girl attention was the background. It was the same street she went to shopping during the day… and the storefront with the gentle old woman was nowhere to be found.
A little worried, Chloe began to ask herself if she dreamed it all. She went to her sister room, but she found exactly like she left her. It wasn’t a dream. She left the room once again.
Before going to bed, Chloe decided to go to the pc. There, she…
132121121.title: She was now wearing the same pjs as the girl on...

1321211211.content: Opening Microsoft Word, the started a list of commands for her sister to follow. The commands included...
1321211211.title: Wrote a list of things to make her sister do

1321211212.content:
Chloe decided to google “Magical Diapers – For all ages”. Maybe she could get some result. As she were expecting, she didn’t find an official page of the company or something like that. She began to search through forums and blogs, to get information. However, she found nothing. That until she opened an old-looking blog.
The blog master, someone called “The Seeker”, reported a strange accident. He (The Seeker wrote using the male pronoun, but Chloe’s sixth sense told her that was a female under cover) wrote that his life changed after meeting a strange woman that gave him a package full of magic items. In the blog, it was reported that the mysterious woman disappeared into nowhere. There was no trace of diapers in the entire blog, but the circumstances were… suspicious, to say the least.
The article was posted in January 2012, almost eight years before. Could the mysterious lady possibly be the same person?
Chloe was happy of the magical diapers, of course, but curious as she was, she wanted to find out what was the meaning behind them.
After having finished her research on the topic, Chloe decided to look for something else. She went on the online portal of a nearby store, where she looked at the baby supplies. She found a lot of interesting things: a baby stroller big enough for Penny, a collection of pacifiers, a baby bottle… wonderful. The two sisters would have spent a beautiful weekend together… beautiful for Chloe, at least.
After having took note of the supplies, Chloe simply turned the pc off. As she was going to the bathroom to take a shower and go to bed, however, her eyes fell over the package of diapers. It was still closed. But that was impossible! She diapered her sister earlier, she was sure of it!
Chloe looked better at the package, but nothing changed. It was still intact. She touched it, and she was sure that it was still full. So it restored itself. Well, it was strange, but on the other hand that meant that she could keep diapering her sister without the fear to run out of diapers.
As she was controlling the package, however, she heard her cellphone ringing.
Chloe took the phone, and she saw that the caller was…
1321211212.title: Googled “Magical Diapers – For all ages”

choices: Say she can't come with an excuse
13212112122.content:
Chloe took the phone, and she saw that the caller was her best friend, Giselle.
Chloe answered to the phone, saying “Hi, Giselle.”
“Hi, Chloe.” Giselle said, shily as usual “How are you?”
“I’m fine, thank you.” Chloe replied “We saw each other this morning in school, remember?”
“Of course.” Giselle said “But I was wondering something.”
“No.” Chloe said, with a determined voice “For the 8th time, I don’t have a secret boyfriend.”
On the other side of the phone, she heard a giggle.
“Oh, Chloe! You know that I believe you, but you must admit is a likely scenario. You are home alone, after all.” Giselle said.
“I’m not home alone. Don’t you remember? I have a little sister.” Chloe said.
“So you’re playing babysitter?” Giselle continued.
Chloe laughed, replying “Indeed, I am.”
“So you assure me you have not invited Mark there, right?” she asked again.
“Who the hell is Mark?” exclaimed Chloe
“Oh, I said the first name that came in my mind.” Giselle giggled.
Chloe sighed. Giselle was her bestie, but she was a strange girl indeed.
“No, I’m alone with Penny.” she said.
“Sooo… you don’t mind if I come to see.” Giselle said.
Chloe froze for a moment. She found herself in a really bad situation. Saying no would have meant confirm to Giselle something that wasn’t true. It would have meant that her best friend would have brought up the subject a school, probably ruining her reputation among boys. On the other hand, saying yes would have meant showing Penny to Giselle… and be forced to reveal her about the magical diapers.
What to do?
13212112122.title: Her best friend, Giselle

132121121222.content: Giselle soon came over. Chloe, smiling, showed her Penny, explaining about the diapers. Did Giselle want to try one on?
132121121222.title: Invite her over

choices: "I will spend the night here with you."
1321211212221.content:
Giselle was a good looking girl. She was tall and slim, without however looking like a starving person like many girls in our time usually look like. She had long blonde hair and a beautiful face, on which shined two deep blue eyes covered by a pair of round glasses that gave her the look of an intellectual. The freckles around her nose didn’t ruin her beauty, but made her look cuter.
As the two girls exited Penny’s room, Giselle looked at Chloe in the eyes, saying “So you say that those diapers are magical?”
“So it seems. The package mysteriously refilled itself, and I tried to give an order to Penny. She obeyed, but that could have been a coincidence. Tomorrow morning I’ll have the definitive confirm.”
Giselle suddenly blushed, then asked “Maybe we can try it right now. You could… put one on me.”
Chloe looked at Giselle with wide open eyes. After passing some seconds like that, she said “Are you sure? If they really work, you will be like my little slave. I don’t want it. And… those are diapers! Do you really want to be put in diapers at your age?”
“Just a little test, then you’ll remove them from me. I mean, I trust you, I’m sure you won’t force me to do nothing I wouldn’t like.” Giselle replied, still blushing.
Chloe was a little hesitant, but then she nodded. She accompanied Giselle in the living room, where she showed her the package.
Giselle looked at it, and saw the same things Chloe had seen before.
A giggle escaped from the blushing Giselle, as she read “Keep your little girl in line putting a good padding over her well spanked bottom? Really?”
Chloe laughed, and replied “I’ll try it tomorrow with Penny.”
“Oh, I’m eager to that.” Giselle laughed too, then adding “Now… are you ready to diaper me?”
Chloe nodded, and patted the sofa “Lay down here, baby.”
Giselle complied, and Chloe proceeded to strip her down (she was wearing a cute pair of panties with a teddy bear printed on them), powder and diaper her.
Once Giselle was diapered, she asked “And now, mommy?”
Chloe laughed, and said “Oh, Giselle!”
“You should give me an order. To see if I obey you.” Giselle said.
Chloe though about it, and said “But it must be something unpleasant you wouldn’t usually do, or we will not be sure of the magic at works.”
Giselle touched her chin, and replied “You’re right. Just this time, ok?”
Chloe nodded, and said “Giselle! Now you’ll put your nose in the corner with your hands on your head and you will say to me how old you were when you wetted the bed for the last time.”
The other girl laughed, saying “Oh, you can forget about it.”
As she said that, however, she felt a deep urge raising from inside her. She marched automatically to the closer corner and putted herself with the nose in it. She then putted her hands on her head and said “The last time I wetted the bed I was 13 years old.”
Chloe exclaimed, surprised “13 years old? Two years ago?”
“I was sick!” Giselle defended herself.
“So, I command you to tell me how old you were when you still did it regularly.” Chloe said.
“I was 12.” Giselle said, blushing deeply “Please, don’t make fun of me.”
“Oh, Giselle…” Chloe replied. She reached her and took her out from the corner, hugging her close, then said “I would never make fun of you. You were amazing in helping me with these diapers. Come, cutie. I will remove it.”
Chloe took Giselle back to the sofa and proceeded to remove the diaper from her and put her back in her cute underwear.
“What do you plan to do now, Giselle?” Chloe asked, has her friend putted her trousers back on “Will you spend the night here with us? Or will you come back tomorrow morning?”
Giselle looked at her best friend, and replied…
1321211212221.title: Giselle in diapers!

132121121222111.content:
Once both Chloe and Giselle had noticed their respective mothers of the fact, the two girls prepared for the night.
They both washed themselves and changed into their pjs.
Chloe pajama was a long-sleeved shirt with long sweatpants. Both the pieces were cream color, and the upper part had the printed sentence “I love to sleep.”. It was quite mature, without been like the inappropriate one that Penny was wearing before the diapering.
Giselle wore one of Chloe’s pajamas too, since she didn’t take there one that belonged to her as she didn’t think that she would have stopped for the night. The pajama that Chloe gave her was extremely simple: it was completely white.
The two girls hugged each other, laughing.
“Oh, Giselle!” Chloe said “I can’t wait for tomorrow morning!”
“Can I ask what command you gave to Penny?” Giselle asked.
Chloe giggled, replying “I commanded her to wet herself during the night and to come to me tomorrow morning asking for a punishment.”
“Oh, I see.” Giselle giggled too “You are really trying to straight out that brat.”
“Exactly. And I must thank that kind old woman for this.” she made a pause, then added “But this doesn’t mean I will not try to understand who she is. I cannot simply accept all of this without questions.”
“You are always so clever, Chloe.” Giselle said “I really envy you.”
“You envy me? Your grades are twice as mine. Well, not that it takes so much to double me.” Chloe said, blushing.
“That is because you don’t use your brain in school.” Giselle sighed, making her friend laugh.
As they were preparing to go to sleep, however, the doorbell rang.
Chloe went straight to the door, asking aloud “Who’s there?”
A kind and feminine voice replied “Open up, Chloe. I can open myself, if you don’t do it.”
A little scared, Chloe look in the door’s peephole, and saw a beautiful lady in her early 30’s.
Like responding to an unseen force, Chloe opened the door. The beauty that appeared in front of her was breathtaking.
The woman in her early 30’s was very tall and with a top model body. She had very long wavy and titian hair and two strange violet eyes.
Before Chloe could ask anything, the strange woman touched her bottom, saying “No diaper, uh?”
Chloe blushed, and the woman said “So I must presume you didn’t try them on yourself. Smart girl.”
Without waiting an invitation, the woman entered in the house closing the door behind her. As she saw Giselle, she went straight to her.
As she reached her, Giselle stepped back saying “Don’t touch me!”
The woman looked at her. She pointed a finger at her face and with a strict voice she said in a scolding tone “Do you want a spanking, little girl?”
Giselle froze in place at the threat (more for her imperious tone that for the threat itself) and the woman proceeded to touch her bottom.
“No diaper here either.” she said “I assume you have diapered someone else.”
“My little sister, Penny.” Chloe said, finally shaking herself from the trance she had fallen into “But who are you? And how do you know about the diapers?”
“It’s not obvious?” the woman said, with the tone of voice of someone that is talking to a little kid “I’m the daughter of the woman that gave them to you. My name is Martinephasia. My friends call me Marty.”
“Are you a witch?” Chloe asked.
Martinephasia gave her a strict gaze, replying “I have knowledge of magic. What I am exactly doesn’t concern you, but I warn you: witch is considered an harsh insult for people like me and my mother. Call me that name again and you will win a trip over my knees.”
“Martinaphesia…” Giselle intervened, gaining an harsh gaze too.
“It’s Martinephasia.” the woman corrected her “If it’s too difficult for you, little girl, just call me Marty.”
After an apology, Giselle said “Marty, can I ask you what are you doing here? Are you going to take back the diapers?”
“Oh, no.” Marty replied “The diapers now belong to Chloe. I will not take them back.”
“So, why are you here?” Chloe asked again.
“To offer myself as a nanny for Penny, of course.” Marty said, shocking the two girls “I will take care of her for you. But if you think that you can do it yourself, I will go.”
“Umh… thank you, miss.” Chloe said “But I prefer take care of my sister myself.”
“As you wish, little girl.” Marty replied, giving a piece of paper to her “If you change your mind, this is my number.”
As she have given her phone number, she reached the door and went out. She disappeared as she had appeared.
“That woman scared me.” Giselle said, breathing deeply, calmer once that the visitor was gone.
“Me too.” agreed Chloe “I felt like a puppy before her.”
“God, I think I almost wetted myself when she threated to give me a spanking.” continued Giselle “I felt like a child.”
Chloe hugged her friend, and with her warmer tone she said “We’d better go to sleep. It has been a long day.”
Giselle nodded, and the two went to sleep.
Where did Giselle went to sleep?
132121121222111.title: A strange visitor

Sara grumbles and grabs her phone and goes upstairs to her room. She could hear Dorothy shout angrily and she just laughs. She turns on the light, locks the door and lies on her bed.

Sighing, she thinks about the times she's been made fun of by her friends and family and her eyes start to water. She shakes her head and rubs her eyes. She wished they wouldn't judge her. It wasn't that childish to watch and play around. So what if she was sensitive, her friends and family should've been understanding. Times like these, she wished she had better friends.

She grabbed her earphones and plugged them into her phone. Putting on one of her favorite anime shows, she stuffed some oreos she'd been saving. After a few hours, she paused. Leaving the room with her phone, she decided to go get today's mail. Opening the door to her house, she found a box with her name on it. She grabbed the box and got mail from the mailbox and went back inside.

She sat on the dining room table wondering about the box and what was inside. "Hanna, dinner's ready. Hurry and come wash your hands!" Her mom shouted from the kitchen. She quickly put everything down and rushed to the kitchen. "What's for dinner mommy?" Hanna askes, curious. Dorothy comes from the restroom and mocks her. "Isn't it time for you to stop using baby words? Saying mommy and daddy is so childish." She teased.

Sara glared at her. "Can't you leave me alone for once? Stop being so mean all the time." She shouted then turned to her mother. "Dorothy, leave your sister alone and Hanna, you really do need to start growing up. You are going to college soon in 4 more years." Her mom said while serving dinner for everyone. Her phone in her pocket and the box in her left side, she opened the door to her room and placed the box on her bed. She grabbed her watermelon style scissors and jumped on the bed.

She excitedly cut the box and opened it up. Inside was a letter, a baby bottle, and diaper. She furrowed her eyebrows before grabbing the letter. On it said:
Addressed to: Hanna Ramne

From: Calium, Mari, and June

Her lips started to frown as she stared at the letter. She opened it and read:

Dear Hanna, our overgrown baby

We are getting tired of your childish antics and how sensitive you act. Maybe it's time to treat you how you act. We bought you a diaper and baby bottle so you can use them. From now on, we will treat you as a kid until you stop acting like one.

She whispered, trying to hold back her tears as she stared at the diaper and bottle. She looked and looked until her vision got blurry and tears started to pour. She threw the box off her bed and started to cry. Trying to wipe the tears off but they kept coming.

She pressed her lips tight as a gasp tried to come up. She grabbed a tissue and blew her nose and threw it in the trash. Her heart felt so hurt. SHe couldn't believe them. Sitting down on the counter - her favorite spot to eat - she ate her delicious meal and put the plate and cup into the sink. “It’s your turn to wash the dishes. And since you were so rude, I will not help you.” Hanna teased and quickly washed her hands with scented honey soap and went into the dining room. Grabbing the brown box, she quickly took off. Her phone in her pocket and the box in her left side, she opened the door to her room and placed the box on her bed. She grabbed her watermelon style scissors and jumped on the bed.

She excitedly cut the box and opened it up. Inside was a letter, a baby bottle, and diaper. She furrowed her eyebrows before grabbing the letter. On it said:
Addressed to: Hanna Ramne

From: Calium, Mari, and June

Her lips started to frown as she stared at the letter. She opened it and read:

Dear Hanna, our overgrown baby

We are getting tired of your childish antics and how sensitive you act. Maybe it's time to treat you how you act. We bought you a diaper and baby bottle so you can use them. From now on, we will treat you as a kid until you stop acting like one.


Hanna crumpled up the note and her eyes started to water for the second time today. "H-how could they be so mean..." She whispered, trying to hold back her tears as she stared at the diaper and bottle. She looked and looked until her vision got blurry and tears started to pour. She threw the box off her bed and started to cry. Trying to wipe the tears off but they kept coming.

She pressed her lips tight as a gasp tried to come up. She grabbed a tissue and blew her nose and threw it in the trash. Her heart felt so hurt. SHe couldn't believe them. 155512122112212131.content:
Maria is playing in the sandbox when she feels wetness hitting her Pull-Ups.

Normally, she would ignore this. Her Pull-Up would stay wet until mommy or daddy noticed and told her she had an accident, and then change her.

But this Pull-Up was different. As the wetness flooded the trainer, new knowledge flooded her mind. I'm having an accident. I'm wetting my Pull-Up. I'm peeing.

155513.content:
Alright, who are we going to follow?

Blake, age 4. Blake is experiencing a very powerful emotion right now: Confusion. Moving to a new house? Confusing. Switching to a new preschool? Confusing. His younger brother Adam, age 2, starting to potty train? Well, not confusing, but it's another change he's not sure of. So much change is going on. It's no wonder that Blake's bedwetting has started to spike. He used to only wet 3, 4 times a week. A decent amount, but low enough that plastic sheets were enough to cover for it. Now, it's nightly... and accidents while awake are also occurring. What will this magic diaper do? Will it give him what he wants, to turn back time? Will it allow him to be confident through this upheaval? Will it reveal that the past wasn't all that it cracked up to be?

Ryan, age 3. Ryan is a very pushy toddler. He knows what he wants, and what he doesn't want. He wants toys, and cookies, and playtime, and he doesn't want to nap, or go on car rides, or sit on the potty. And if he doesn't get what he wants, or is forced to do what he doesn't? Well, it's a one-way ticket to Tantrum-Ville. What will the magic diaper do? Will it flip his personality upside down and turn him obedient and passive? Maybe it'll show him what happens to boys who are whiny and ungrateful. Or perhaps it'll simply tone down his more aggressive desires.

Nate, age 2. Nate is a very clingy and slightly nervous toddler. He's apprehensive about a lot of things, and tends to attach himself to his parent's legs if he's scared. And few things scare him more than the potty right now. It's so big and scary! What will this magic diaper do? Give him courage? Dispell his fear? Or perhaps prove his toileting fears right?

Ian, age 5. Ian feels guilty over his bedwetting. Especially since it's been 3 years since he's learned to use the potty and he's still gotta wear diapers to his bedtime. But maybe this special bedwetting diaper will help him. Will his wet nights turn dry? Maybe his guilt will be assuaged? Or perhaps, this protection will not be enough.
155513.title: Your own choice.

Donna, Age 40 - Donna is a textbook DL and in an effort to hide her love of such things she buys a strange kind of diaper off the web and hijinks ensue.

Vanessa, Age 12 - Vanessa is worried about finally becoming a teenager proper and when she steals one of her younger sisters diapers to wear them for a dare from her online friend she soon finds that she won’t need to worry longer...

Jenny, Age 21 - After her first legal night of getting blackout drunk... Jenny awakens with a odd package of diapers on her counter... and the worst part is she’s already wearing one...

Ivory, Age 50 - After her first accident since childhood, the elderly Ivory invests in some odd diapers that might just take her back to her childhood.
